ctx: intros f g a b pr_f pr_g pr.
exceptions.exn: In environment f, g : R -> R a, b : R pr_f : Riemann_integrable f a b pr_g : Riemann_integrable g a b pr : Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => f x + g x) a b Unable to unify "RiemannInt ?M2290 = RiemannInt ?M2288 + ?M2287 * RiemannInt ?M2289" with "(let (a0, _) := RiemannInt_exists pr RinvN RinvN_cv in a0) = (let (a0, _) := RiemannInt_exists pr_f RinvN RinvN_cv in a0) + (let (a0, _) := RiemannInt_exists pr_g RinvN RinvN_cv in a0)".

original: intros f g a b pr_f pr_g pr. unfold RiemannInt. apply RiemannInt_P13.
